title: Replace your clumsy Apple TV control with an easy button remote — Now 38% off
content:
Macworld

Love your Apple TV but hate it’s remote? Replace it with one that looks…well…normal. This hybrid Bluetooth + infrared remote makes it easy to control not just your Apple TV but also your TV, soundbar, and receiver—all from one device.

Navigating between apps, adjusting the volume, and switching audio devices is effortless. The Bluetooth allows for quick pairing and superior range, while the IR feature controls power, volume, and mute on over 100 brands of TVs and soundbars.

Need to switch profiles or set a sleep timer? Press and hold the Up button. You can also control your AirPods and HomePod directly through the audio controls. Plus, switching apps and closing frozen ones has never been easier with intuitive buttons.

Set it up with easy instructions and USA-based support that is ready to help you get started. Whether a new user or just looking to upgrade your experience, The Button Remote is your Apple TV solution.

Grab The Button Remote for just $24.97 (reg. $39.99) and simplify your Apple TV experience today!
